title: bandadhella barali
sahitya:
bandadellA barali gOvindana dayanamagirali 
(banda)

anupallavi

mandAradara gOvinda mukundana sandarshana ondiddarE sAladE
(banda)

caraNam

singana hEgalEri sAkakekari bangavEkE madyakE rangana daya
uLLavakE bhavabangada
BhayakEyahangE mangaLa mahima shrI purandaraviThala rangana daya
ondiddarE sAladE 
(banda)
